channel.title: [PI]Problem loading cache?Done all dropbox ect
channel.description:
HEY MOPARSCAPE! User's im currently runing a 474 Erasedpkz server the cache picks up error at Totalpkzcache>MAP>(MAP CONFIG.TXT) as is below this is my problem i do not get the error with the erased pkz cache but my cache all editted sucessfully apart from this problem is normally unusual
Help hell of a Lot if somebody could help me!
[u][i][b] Total-Pkz is loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\TotalPkzCache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system c annot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:80) at client.startUp(client.java:8762) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6035) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/b][/i][/u]

item.title: [PI]Problem loading cache?Done all dropbox ect
item.dc:creator: @total_pkz total pkz
item.description:
@total_pkz wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:422463”]You really don’t understand this error?
It’s self-explanatory.
The system cannot find the path specified at C:\TotalPkzCache\Maps\mapConfig.txt … C:\TotalPkzCache\Maps\mapConfig.txt does not exist.[/quote]
Bro dont talk like a pro
The file is in there and thats why i am posting asking for help?

Read full topic
